definitions.text: a person who uses the mind creatively
of or associated with or requiring the use of the mind
examples: the triumph of the rational over the animal side of man

definitions.text: appealing to or using the intellect
examples: intellectual workers engaged in creative literary or artistic or scientific labor
has tremendous intellectual sympathy for oppressed people

definitions.text: involving intelligence rather than emotions or instinct
examples: a cerebral approach to the problem
